name: Barf Royale
description:
The King has ordered a feast and it is up to you to protect him from those who would do him wrong! You are the royal court appointed food taster and you are the last line of defense between the King and a horrendous fate.

However, the King is impatient, and excessively hungry if you take too long to serve him his dinner then he will become most irate.

Keep your king happy and healthy, or it'll be your head!
